value:
$WmMPID_ミドリコ,ch05_54_Midoriko_F_Normal,Face|I wish I could spend more time
with Father...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|My brother should be here...
Somewhere in this forest...
Maybe a little farther in...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Visibility seems low throughout
the wood. We could cover more
ground if we were to split up...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|In that case—Peony, come with
me in this direction!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|OK! It's almost like we're playing
a big game of hide-and-seek...
How fun!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I know! I'm having fun too!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Such odd people. Like children.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Let's head deeper into the forest,
shall we, Princess Veronica?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Lead on.$k$p$Sbs150|
